AskDob: OK. For verification, please tell me the date of birth of this policy holder.
re-elicitPhone: I'm sorry. Please tell me the policy holder's phone number again.
re-elicitPhone1: I didn't follow. Please tell me the policy holder's phone number
PhoneNumberConfirmation1: <speak>That was <say-as interpret-as='digits'>{phone_number}</say-as>. Correct? Please say either 'yes' or 'no'</speak>
InvalidPhone: I didn't find a match. Please say or enter the policy holder's phone number again.
AskMake: I am going to request the vehicle details to help you remove vehicle from policy. Tell me the make of the vehicle.
Fulfilment: Done. The vehicle has been removed from your policy and your premium has been updated accordingly. We will send you an email with the confirmation. Anything else?
Failure: Sorry I'm not able to remove vehicle from your policy at the moment. Let me connect you to a representative who can help.
DeniedConfirmation: Okay then. I will not proceed. What else can I do for you?
Confirmation: All right. Removing a vehicle from your policy will result in premium decrease. Your new estimated monthly premium would be, $162. The change will be effective from today, {today}. Should I go ahead and remove the vehicle?
FailureReason: I am not able to remove the vehicle from your policy because {reason}. Anything else?
